name: Brain Ltd.
description:
Brain Ltd. Controls
  • <Arrows>: move cursor
  • <C>: buy/sell stock or borrow or payback bonds
How to Play

You are working in Brain Ltd., a trading company in the year 2035.

Your goal is to survive. The game ends when you can't pay the fee of the bonds you borrowed.

To make money, you can buy and sell stocks, which prices fluctuate with time.

You can also borrow money, but you will need to pay a fee every 2 seconds. To stop paying the fee, you can payback.

Notes

Made for the Trijam #195: Cut your Losses, 3h code, 1h art.

Dev, art, music and cover by Martin Cirice, made on the PICO-8 fantasy console.
